items.title: What is a Folgezettel?
items.content_html:
A Folgezettel is a method for organizing notes by providing each note a unique alphanumeric ID.

The main point of a Folgezzetel is to force you to think about the relationships between your notes. Sure, you can simply link between them, but the Fogezzetel also gives you a visual representation of how your ideas may be related.

The main point of a Folgezzetel is to force you to think about the relationships between your notes. Sure, you can simply link between them, but the Fogezzetel also gives you a visual representation of how your ideas may be related.

items.title: Post to Micro.blog using Drafts
items.content_html: I was able to configure the Drafts App to post to any one of my Micro.blog sites using the original [Post to Micro.blog wCategories] (https://actions.getdrafts.com/a/1Sr) Action which and then some assistance in the forums to tweak it to support multiple blogs.
items.content_text: I was able to configure the Drafts App to post to any one of my Micro.blog sites using the original [Post to Micro.blog wCategories] (https://actions.getdrafts.com/a/1Sr) Action which and then some [assistance in the forums](https://forums.getdrafts.com/t/post-to-micro-blog-with-more-than-one-blog-per-id/10407) to tweak it to support multiple blogs.
